nodes.bodyText: Maybe use File.separator instead of /.
I tested it with the File.separator, it worked but I think the readability decreases with the usage of the File.separator. Therefore, i would keep the current implementation.
Please check that newFile is a file and not a folder.
i added a check for that
Please check that newFolder is a folder and not a file.
i added a check for that
Maybe also test renaming a folder.
i added a test case for renaming a folder
There is no assert here, is this correct?
i added an assert to this method

first create some "local" changes without committing them (in the best case, use the online code editor to add and modify files). If this is not possible, then directly manipulate the local git
Then create a merge conflict by changing the same files in the originGit
TODO: check if the Artemis server detects the conflict
Then invoke reset
Then check, that all local changes are removed and there is no conflict any more
i adapted the method
check that the files actually exists, some of them might get filtered by the way?
i added a check, which checks if the files actually exist
please convert this into a non static method that is invoked on itself.
localRepo --> this
i adapted the method
I adapted the method and divided it into two methods -> getAllLocalCommits & getAllOriginCommits
can you be a bit more specific here when testing for the correct status?
